title: India Orders Messaging Apps to Work Only With Active SIM Cards to Prevent Fraud and Misuse
description: India's Department of Telecommunications (DoT) has issued directions to app-based communication service providers to ensure that the platforms cannot be used without an active SIM card linked to the user's mobile number.
